Reviews.Content: I bought this just for traveling. Its not bad at all but what else can I ask for I only paid $150.00 so I can't really expect much. But if your looking for a lens to travel to take far away images this is the one to go. I would not recommend it if you are planning to do any Professional Portraits it did not work for me

Reviews.Title: awesome pics
Reviews.Author: Adolfo Gman
Reviews.Content: Bought for my wife and it firs the camera perfect. It makes her oics look really nice and was in perfect condition. A little pricy but its cheaper on here than retail stores

Reviews.Title: Great lens for those mid-range to somewhat long shots...
Reviews.Author: S. Hoffman ""Evel""
Reviews.Content: It was packaged from Nikon...refurbished, and works great. The only thing is that I'll need to spend the money on the VR lens eventually; at the zoomed level there will be blur if your camera doesn't do the VR thing on its own. Not dogging it, but wasn't too keen on spending as much as the camera for the VR lens, either. Shipped fast and in like-new condition. Recommend for the novice like myself!

Reviews.Title: High quality lens with a good price
Reviews.Author: cole jason caldwell
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with this lens. It provides the zoom specs that we require with the ability to be easily packed away. People who are interested in this lens should note that this lens should be used in combination with a tri-pod due to image stabilization factors.

Reviews.Title: Love it! The price is right!
Reviews.Author: DAN MARTINEZ
Reviews.Content: I am still learning how to se my camera but this lens works wonderful for me! I can't wait for summer to get out and take pictures!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Thomas Skarbek
Reviews.Content: this item gives me the opportunity to get better close ups of friends and other without them knowing it, with great quality pictures

Reviews.Title: Nice lens
Reviews.Author: jack w adoline
Reviews.Content: Good quality lens for the price.  Only concern it the noise of the motor during auto focus. Price and quality outweighs a small noise

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS LENS>
Reviews.Author: Jo Ann C. Adams
Reviews.Content: Use this lens all of the time. LOVE IT>....great for the price. Well packaged and great for the price. IT is a manual lens...so you have to do the work.

Reviews.Title: Great zoom lens
Reviews.Author: Kenna
Reviews.Content: I bought this lens to go with a new Nikon D5700. I love the zoom of the lens, and it is very easy to handle.  It does not automatically focus, but that is not a problem if you know how to use manual.  For me, the price was well worth it not to have the automatic setting.  I bought this lens special for the safari that I went on.  It took fantastic, clear and jaw-dropping pictures and I was extremely impressed.  This is a great lens for the value and I would recommend it to anyone who is looking for a good zoom without paying the big prices.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Optics
Reviews.Author: carl brookins "Carl Brookins"
Reviews.Content: Light, easy to use, crisp images, what's not to like? Nikon lenses are and always have been top of the line in this industry. Maybe they are a bit overpriced, but for first class quality, you can't go wrong here.

Reviews.Title: Good quality lens, auto focus does not work on all models!
Reviews.Author: Phoenix J
Reviews.Content: Lens works as advertised. Keep in mind auto focus does not work on all models. Another reviewer has mentioned very conveniently about that feature. I already knew that AF wont work in my camera, but I am purist. I adjust everything myself so I don't care. But just keep that in mind and don't put 1 star reviews for that reason alone. Happy photography!

Reviews.Title: Excellent lens at a good price!
Reviews.Author: William K. Johnson "Trader Bill"
Reviews.Content: I would have preferred an autofocus and VF lens, this was a bargain and it works quite well.  I am quite satisfied with the purchase and with the promptness of delivery.

Reviews.Title: good product at less price
Reviews.Author: Vaibhav wadekar
Reviews.Content: After purchasing this lense..thought of buying one with VR built in ...You have to use this lense with stand..not good with night time photography..as all photos looks shaky however good product at less price

Reviews.Title: Good for the $$$
Reviews.Author: GetawayDee
Reviews.Content: A little difficult for the inexperienced to learn to focus (if your camera doesn't have a built in autofocus motor) but, once you get the hang of it, it's a good lens. Worked great to take pictures of castles on our Rhine cruise (which is what we bought it for). Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great Lens
Reviews.Author: marshall
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I needed for those out of background view shot. Great quality for the price and speed of delivery. Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Lens
Reviews.Author: Ale
Reviews.Content: It is a great lens for a low PRIce the Only things i dont LIKE is that un my d3100 af does not work

Reviews.Title: very cool
Reviews.Author: Candy A. Berg
Reviews.Content: I have used this lens a few times with no regrets of buying it.  I look forward to using it many more times.  Fab price and great shipping.  Thank you so very much.  As a new photographer I am thrilled to be able to buy things at a price I can afford.

Reviews.Title: NIKON 70-300 mm
Reviews.Author: SFC "sfc_e7"
Reviews.Content: I have been using Nikon Cameras since the F4 back in 1969 and gradually been moving up ever since. This 70-300 mm lens gives a lot of choices in shooting. However, it was my intention this would be used in the Arizona Desert Wildlife this 70-300 mm lens has proven it's worth. I was thinking of going to a 400 mm lens, but this lens used at 300 mm is more than one really needs as a hobbyist.

Reviews.Title: telephoto lens
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I am an amateur photographer and I love this lens. It gives me just enough more distance to take photos of sunsets and birds from my 2nd floor apartment. The pics are clear and of good quality,  though due to the extra weight of the lens using a tripod works better

Reviews.Title: Nice but no autofocus for my d3200
Reviews.Author: Stonetemplepilot
Reviews.Content: Nice lens for what I paid. But no autofocus for my d3200 and for other non high-end nikons. However, not recommended for low light ambience.

Reviews.Title: lovin it
Reviews.Author: photoghog
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with this lens!  Hate that auto focus is unavailable with it but it is a fantastic lens otherwise.

Reviews.Title: Nikon 70-300mm zoom lens
Reviews.Author: M. Flowers
Reviews.Content: This helps me get the pictures I want from across our pond and at the wild live where we live. It is a little hard to focus it at times but perhaps with  more use I'll get better :)

Reviews.Title: great outdoors
Reviews.Author: nancy bratton
Reviews.Content: it is great outdoors went lake and got great shots of birds th sky line and isnt to heavy to carry

Reviews.Title: Nikon 70-300mm f4 lens
Reviews.Author: Daniel Huseman
Reviews.Content: A great lens for the price, use it the most when I am walking the trails and birding. Not always asuper fast lens, but its great for what I do with it....a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Ashley Stephens
Reviews.Content: I actually like this lens, especially for the price. Only thing (and I knew this when I bought it, thanks to the reviews) is that there is no automatic focus.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: GG "GG"
Reviews.Content: I received the order very quickly and as described.  I prefer using a manual focus as most of my shots are with a timer and tripod so I don't experience vibration.  I believe it is an excellent value and I would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!!
Reviews.Author: Megan Caputo
Reviews.Content: Just what I needed... in perfect condition and right to my standards!So glad I had the oppurtunity to purchase this productThank You So much!!!

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Randall
Reviews.Content: Este es un excelente producto. Es especificamente lo que solicite. Muy buen servicio. 100% recomendado para otros.Muy bueno .

Reviews.Title: Fair product
Reviews.Author: ronnie
Reviews.Content: I have a D3200 didn't realize this lens does not auto focus. Not ideal for the novice shooter whose primary goal is to take photos of a moving infant. A tripod is also highly recommended due to lack of VR and lens massive zoom range making for blurry pics bc of handshake. Doesn't shoot very well in low light but that could just be me again I'm new to this!

Reviews.Title: Great entry lens, but you get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Customer
Reviews.Content: I have owned and used this lens extensively now for about 4 years, and I can comfortably say that this lens has a lot of bang for the buck. I work as a wildlife biologist (with birds) in very remote, harsh places and have put this lens through quite a test, using it in rain, snow, salty air, banging it on rocks, dropping it. I have had enough bird poop on it to last me a lifetime but this lens is a champ, after all that I am STILL amazed at the quality of this lens (for the price).Lens feels cheap and plasticy, but has not fallen apart in any way and the plastic only makes it lighter so really I can't complain. If you're going to carry a telephoto lens all over place like I do, the lightweight build is a good thing!Optically, this lens is unbeatable for the price in this focal range. I have tried Sigma and Tamron lenses of similar ranges and have not been as pleased as I am with the Nikon version. Granted, you can't use the lens wide open, it needs to be stopped down, and from 200mm-300mm the pictures become pretty soft shooting moving animals (birds) even in broad daylight. This lens is excellent for good lighting and slowly moving subjects but quality quickly goes downhill after that. That being said, I have hand-held photos of flying seabirds off rocking boats at 300mm and am still able to get pictures that identify the birds, but would never win any photo contests.Contrast, color, bokeh, sharpness - all of these are lacking compared to more upscale versions of the lens, and once you get comfortable using the 70-300mm f/4-5.6G AF, you will be left wanting better quality over all.As a beginner who needed a sturdy lens to do the job and do it right, I chose this lens and have not been happier. After four years of heavy use, however, I am ready to move on to the VR version of this lens, which, if you can spend the money in the first place you might as well just do it because that VR is priceless.

Reviews.Title: Autofocus not compatible with D3200 but great deal and quality delivery
Reviews.Author: M. Ferro
Reviews.Content: The autofocus is not compatible with the D3200 but still a great deal.  It arrived in perfect condition.I wish it had included a protective bag and lens hood. Did not.

Reviews.Title: 300 lens.
Reviews.Author: CINDEE OAKES
Reviews.Content: Extra clear. I take wildlife photos. Nikon you are #1 with optics. Thanks for making a quality product for us all.

Reviews.Title: Bought me Some Time
Reviews.Author: me
Reviews.Content: While I really wanted to purchase a VR lens, I couldn't afford it at the time, so I decided to purchase this lens for some neighborhood wildlife shots...Overall performance great, but you must have a tripod to avoid the likely blur to to no Vibration Reduction...I just purchased the VR version today and will be selling this one soon...

Reviews.Title: Does every thing I expected
Reviews.Author: Andrew R Amiott
Reviews.Content: I was a little scared to buy this not knowing much about cameras (bought it for my friend).  But it does everthing I expected it to do.  He is extremely happy with it.  I did my research and read the reviews so no surprises about the limitations of the lens.  It does like light and can be a little blurry with max zoom if not used with a tripod.

Reviews.Title: Nikon camera lens
Reviews.Author: Deborah Whitney "student of the word"
Reviews.Content: I love my new lens!  This is just what I needed to bring objects closer for amazing pictures.  I highly recommend Nikon camera products.

Reviews.Title: It's alright
Reviews.Author: Christopher T Hayes
Reviews.Content: Maybe it just needs to be cleaned, but from the first day we worked with it, all my footage looked foggy. Also the lens is definitely NOT auto focus.

Reviews.Title: Read all reviews first
Reviews.Author: Branden
Reviews.Content: this lense is a very nice lens.  however, it kind of sucks that the lense cannot auto focus on the D5000.  So if you are going to purchase just be ready for that.  if you manually focus your lenses anyway than yo have nothing to worry about.  cant beat the price.

Reviews.Title: GREAT!!!!!
Reviews.Author: natita
Reviews.Content: I've been playing with my new lens 70-300 mm Nikon and pictures are great and clear. I'm happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Perfect entry level lens
Reviews.Author: SandMark
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect entry level lens for the beginner photographer, or even the novice.  I bought it for my son as a grad gift with my old D200 body.  I had to test it first, of course, and the photos were tack sharp.  It focuses fast and accurate, lightweight and comfortable.  I don't think that if you're looking for a good, inexpensive model of an all-around lens, you can't go wrong with this choice.

Reviews.Title: Nikon 70-300 lens
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: Great quality.  Love this lens.  I do a lot of genealogy work and take a lot of pictures of grave stones.  The ability to dial in for a close shot is very helpful.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Ugalde
Reviews.Content: Excelent quality  for the price , it does what it suppose to do .. it does require a lot of light but you can compensate... i am glad i bought this!!!

Reviews.Title: No AF function on Nikon D40
Reviews.Author: Jaime Matus
Reviews.Content: I bought this lens but never stated that does not work on AF on the Nikon D40X. It said it was a full AF lens. Anyway is so cheap that you can livew with that. Otherwise, is a good buy for the price. Tamron is offering a full workinf AF lens with the same speed, so you might consider it instead.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Cassie G. Raulston
Reviews.Content: This is a great lense- I really didn't know much about lenses when I purchased it but learned a few things just by playing with this one. If you are looking for a lense that zooms AND has a wide angle then you might want to keep looking. This has an AWESOME zoom but is not very widescreen (when I shoot objects, I have to stand really far back to capture it- not very suitable for standard shots- in the future, I will try to get an all in one lense- 18-300 would be great if they even make them!)

Reviews.Title: Satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: Christopher D. Evert
Reviews.Content: this lens is not VR, but for the price, the quality is awesome. I'm an ameture just getting started and this has really made a difference in my pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nikon 70-300mm f/4-5.6G AF Nikkor SLR Camera Lens
Reviews.Author: R. Jones "http://www.photoreflect.com/pr3/sto...
Reviews.Content: I purchased this lens on 06/26/2009 and received very quickly and from the moment I started using it, it has become one of my favorite lenses. It seems to be very fast and the pictures look great.I have used it for sporting events, weddings and a few beach photos. Its a great lens but the only thing about it is you have to slide the barrel back and forth to change the focal length, but other that I love it.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive quality lens
Reviews.Author: W. Noonan "Bill"
Reviews.Content: this is an inexpensive and quality zoom lens. It is amazing to me that I ordered it and the following day it arrived. This lens does need a fair amount of light but it was bought for outdoors shooting. A good product.

Reviews.Title: Camera Lens - Wonderful :)
Reviews.Author: Mackenzie Welch
Reviews.Content: I really really loved this lens. It works perfectly with my camera and has allowed me to take AWESOME pictures. Thank you very much for providing such a wonderful camera lens. Might I add, the delivery was quick and the price...very affordable.

Reviews.Title: best bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: Philip Priddy
Reviews.Content: Would love to have purchased a similar lens for 5x the price of this lens but not right now.For the price this is hard to beat. I wanted a "long" lens to take bird pictures and the occasional distant animal/sunset/silhouette shot that I happen onto now and then.If you use a tripod (or a beanbag over a car window)and keep the settings on f8 or even better at f11, the pictures are remarkably sharp.The auto focus seems to hunt a bit but is better than I expected considering the bargain basement cost for the lens.An interesting note is that it appears the lens is often sold used for at or above the cost of a new lens.

Reviews.Title: Nikon 70-300 zoom lens with Nikon D40
Reviews.Author: Bob Jones
Reviews.Content: I just recently got a Nikon D40 for christmas, and i wanted to get a nice zoom lens that would suit my needs, as well as be really inexpensive, and i think this lens fits that to a "t".  contrary to popular belief, this af-g lens does work with the new nikon d40, the only thing is that it does not autofocus. which isnt a big deal really.  I rated this lens as a 5 because it takes amazing pictures.  I love it. you really cant beat this lens for the price.

Reviews.Title: Nikon 70-300mm SLR Camera Lens
Reviews.Author: ChrisGinger Foster
Reviews.Content: The lens was just what I wanted it was awesome, Shipping was extremely fast and this was ordered 1 week before Christmas I had the lens 3 days after I placed my order. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Nikon 70-300mm Nikkor SLR Camera Lens
Reviews.Author: Andy D.
Reviews.Content: The Nikon Nikkor Lens I received came New very quickly. I am very pleased with the service I was provided.  The Lens is very good for being one of the more cheaper 70-300mm lenses that Nikkor provides.  The only thing to remember when purchasing this lens is whether or not you want to be able to focus your lens automatically.  The lens is all manual which can be somewhat problematic if you want a clear picture very quickly.  For the price it's worth it without the Automatic focus.

Reviews.Title: Great Lens for the Price
Reviews.Author: TheWaldo "W."
Reviews.Content: I found mine on clearance at a local Wal-Mart for 84.00. Could not pass it up. The lens is light, seems well made, and gives an awesome range when used with my D50. I could not ask for more. Coupled with my 18-200 Tamron (27-300 on the D50) and this Nikon going 105-450, who needs more. Try it....you'll like it.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy to make work for a D3000 Nikon
Reviews.Author: Jason Buckley
Reviews.Content: If you have a D3000, then this won't work.  I didn't realize how hard it is to manually focus this as  you take pictures during a sporting event.  I'm sure it is fine if the auto focus works, but since it doesn't with my camera it is worthless.

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: Alba Donoso
Reviews.Content: The product is super good, looks and works awesome, was a birthday present for my son who loves photography, he was very happy with the  surprise, and the price was very reasonable!!!!! Totally recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great Lens
Reviews.Author: Michael Gleich
Reviews.Content: The lense does everything it was advertised to do and at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: My first lens
Reviews.Author: khagendra thapa
Reviews.Content: Im using this lens first time in DSLR in my life, its i feel like i m a pro photographer.Because of its size and the image quality. Lenses are perfect.its also captures long range pictures in sharp images.And its also much cheaper than any other large lens.

Reviews.Title: Lens works great.. just not with my camera.
Reviews.Author: J. Norton
Reviews.Content: picture quality was great, I wouldn't expect anything less from Nikon, however I sold it almost as soon as I got it because it did not auto focus with my D5000. Seller was awesome though.. he was willing to go against his own return policy for me if I hadn't resold it my self. Would definitely do business with again.

Reviews.Title: Lens
Reviews.Author: moecker1
Reviews.Content: This was exactly what I ordered and like the product.  It has added more to my pictures.  Thank you again

Reviews.Title: Great item to add to your camera bag.
Reviews.Author: Kay Zimarino
Reviews.Content: This lens is a great deal! I am having so much fun with learning how to take better photos.  Only one regret...I should have purchased one of these long ago!

Reviews.Title: Nice Lens
Reviews.Author: Vincent.
Reviews.Content: Was not sure what to expect for the money but happy with the lens. It is not a true auto focus lens but takes great pictures. Brings the action up close when you are at a distance. Was awesome on vacation taking sun rise and sun set. Works great for sporting events and continuous shooting as well.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Lens
Reviews.Author: Tamari
Reviews.Content: I am going to buy this lens and Can I use this for my Nikon D5100? Will auto focus work for it?

Reviews.Title: Decent lens for the money
Reviews.Author: mmsumulong "mmsumulong"
Reviews.Content: I don't want to say "you get what you pay for" but for the money this is the best that you can get. I mean it's not a lousy lens as some would say it to be but a functional at least. Obviously Nikon had to cut some corners hence the plastic mount and non-ED glass. Also it doesn't have the silent wave motor meaning you have to focus manually if you are using a D5100/5200 and below model. But on a positive note, it can still take sharp pictures. Though at 200mm-300mm, there may CA issues. But then again what do you expect at this price level? As long as you know the limitations of this lens and you can still get great photos. Just see the user posted pictures. In short this lens though not really fantastic is a good starter telephoto lens for the money. There is a reason why this is one of Nikon's oldest lens still in production next to the 50mm f/1.8D. And if you want more, then obviously you'll have to spend more.

Reviews.Title: nikon lens
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: it was a good lens but unable to set for manual/auto setting. But u can capture photo super close even u're far.

Reviews.Title: Nikon 70-300mm lens
Reviews.Author: Robert Miller "Bob M"
Reviews.Content: This is a great lens. It is not VR, but I wanted the manual lens so that I can adjust the settings as I wish. Can't wait to get out and take some really great pictures with it.

Reviews.Title: Fills the gap
Reviews.Author: Jade Queen "Jade"
Reviews.Content: First lens I bought for my DSLR, which came with the 18-55 lens.  Great for zooming in, and fun to work with the manual focus.  Very pleased, reasonably priced, came new in box with all documentation.

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware
Reviews.Author: Professor Jack
Reviews.Content: I neglected to read the reviews so hopefully this will stop someone else from making the same mistake I did.  Auto-focus is NOT an option with the D40, D40x, and several other common models, something I think the description neglects to mention.That said, it's still a very good lens.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: MM "mm"
Reviews.Content: My son is taking photography at school.  This was a great addition to his camera of choice.  It was well worth the money for the quality it provides.

Reviews.Title: nikon 70-300
Reviews.Author: T. Cato
Reviews.Content: I picked up this lens today from the post office.  Where do I start...  this lens has paint on it!  This lens makes noise.  This lens is tight!  This lens is dirty!  This lens has marks up and down the body frame.  I feel as if I purchased this item from value village.  Seriously!  It's pointless to mount this lens because it's so _____.  I am so shocked I looked at the review again.  I did not see beat up lens in the description.

Reviews.Title: Nikon 70-300
Reviews.Author: Thomas H. Adams "Tom Adams"
Reviews.Content: I bought a Nikon D-200 with an 18-70mm kit lens.  I wanted to get closer to the action so picked up this lens after some reviews.  It's really a great close up lens, but at the full 300mm it is REALLY hard to hold it steady without a tripod.  And I have to say, that when I want a close up shot, the 70-300 is on my camera, and when I want to shoot a bird, the wide angle is on the camera.  Now I keep thinking that the 18-200 VR lens would have been a pretty good choice afterall.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed with this Tamron Lens.
Reviews.Author: R. F. Edwards
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately, this Tamron lens does not satisfy me. Too heavy, poor focusing atthe 300mm level. Could be me but I don't think so. Tamron ,in the past, has been brilliant.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Denise
Reviews.Content: I am loving this lens and I am so glad I ordered it. It is a big help in my photo bag.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying the len for my nikon D80
Reviews.Author: Armando
Reviews.Content: when I order this I said it an okay deal...then after reading all the review some good and some bad....then I started to think maybe I didn't get a deal after all....but a few days later I got my lens and put on my camera....testing it with a tree I got on my backyard, then with my grandson.....the following day I attended a fight and use with my Nikon D80 the following day I went to the park used, tomorrow I take it to work and use it there. I am liking it, and I think I am going to love it and take many good photos.....its light, focus work well and short and long range was descend. I downloaded photo to my laptop and they look good, some came out blurry but that because I had it out of focus but I was able to zoom quickly and the autofocus work well, it perfect for me, I am not a beginner nor I am an expert. I am just in the middle and I like it very much already....

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Taylor Riley
Reviews.Content: I loved this lens, took amazing photos with it, can't wait to do more shots. I really love this lens.

Reviews.Title: camera lens
Reviews.Author: savannah louchart
Reviews.Content: This lens works like a charm. It is so easy to change from one lens to another and no regrets here.

Reviews.Title: Very good service
Reviews.Author: Gearold McCoy
Reviews.Content: The co did a good job helping me to send it back, I did not get the leans I was looking for so I sent it back and you did a great job helping me do so

Reviews.Title: Great Camera Lens
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Carole in Texas"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband.  His hobby is photography and he is a very good photographer.  His other lens had broken, so I bought this one for him.  He is very pleased with it and the way it works with his camera.  It was well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: good people
Reviews.Author: K. Sanchez "Pic guy"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this not know it was not the correct lens for my camera just a simple mis read on my part they were very nice i was able to return it with no problem an looked to see if they had the correct lens in stock they were not able to find the one i needed but i was happy with this vendor.

Reviews.Title: a good value
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: Not a pro, but this was a really good value for me.

Reviews.Title: No autofocus for Nikon SLR (D3100)
Reviews.Author: Qute
Reviews.Content: The product description was really poor on Amazon for this product. And it says that this zoom is compatible to Nikon SLR D3100. But it fails to specify that only manual focus is possible for all Nikon SLR. Fortunately the price is very reasonable. I don't mind to use manual focus after all. Additionally the quality of photos seems to be fine. But I will know more after few weeks. I would give 4 stars if bought this zoom by knowing there is no autofocus function for Nikon D3100.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Lens 70-300
Reviews.Author: Joseph S. Kyler
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with how quickly I received the order and with the product. I used this Lens while attending a Seminar a few days after receiving it and was very pleased with the quality of the pictures.

Reviews.Title: nikkor slr 70-300 lens
Reviews.Author: William J. Ebner
Reviews.Content: I found this lens to be excellant for my use. It is esay to install and use on my nikon camera. I am very pleased with the lens. Plus it was an excellant price thru amazon.

Reviews.Title: 70- 300mm lens
Reviews.Author: julian
Reviews.Content: Its ok for the price. I know that is cheap but, with a telephoto les withouth vr stabilizer, you have to take pics with hi speed so it doesn't get blur on your pics

Reviews.Title: This is a great lens...
Reviews.Author: Byron Gates, Jr. "[artist/photographer/writer]"
Reviews.Content: I shoot with three lens in my bag, 10>20mm Sigma, 18>70mm Nikkor and 70>300mm Sigma which covers 10>300mm, all I need. I love my Sigma 70>300, it's very light, durable, a macro w/acceptable limitations and sharp as a tack and any zoom range I select. I have owned this lens for about 6 years, it has never failed me and I have never been disappointed with its results. It's a winner...b

Reviews.Title: Awful!
Reviews.Author: M. Koll
Reviews.Content: This lens does not have an internal motor, which is fine.  The clarity of the glass sucks when focused manually or with a camera body with its own motor.  It has been my only clinker lens.  The 2197 version is twice the price, but it does auto-focus and the focus is much sharper.  I've seen this in larger stores for $200 used.  Be patient and shop,

Reviews.Title: Lens
Reviews.Author: Marie Whitehill
Reviews.Content: I am having trouble understanding how to use it.I wish there was someone I could talk to.Do not get me wrong there is nothing wrong with the lens I just do not understand it.

Reviews.Title: Auto focus did not work with my 3200.
Reviews.Author: Ron Brown
Reviews.Content: Although it was an auto focus lens and said it would work with my 3200 camera, it did not.  I must manually focus it.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the price
Reviews.Author: Keith A. Morse
Reviews.Content: I'm a beginner who still wanted the longer reach that this lens offered. The difference between this and a 70-200mm lens was amazing, especially when the effective zoom is equivalent to more than a 300mm -- more like 450mm, I'm told. By only complaint was the length of time it took Amazon to get this product to me. It arrived at my house while I was on vacation, getting by with a 70-200mm lens and cursing my bad fortune.

Reviews.Title: Nikons Top Worst Lens!
Reviews.Author: Phill Round
Reviews.Content: I am very surprised that Nikon produce such a poor quality Chinese made lens. This lens will only damage Nikon's good name for quality optics. The only thing going for it is the low weight. As for optical quality I would like to give it a minus rating due to the awful very poor optics. You don't even get what you pay for! Avoid at all costs!

Reviews.Title: Manual Focus.
Reviews.Author: Harshad Sonaje
Reviews.Content: If you do not have inbuilt motor in your SLR then don't even think of this one. I am still trying this lens out I am not very please with the quality either. I am still undecided weather I will return this lens or not.

Reviews.Title: Nikon lens review
Reviews.Author: Gary K. Fiske "Gary K. Fiske"
Reviews.Content: Product was what it said it was and was delivered very fast and at a very good price.

Reviews.Title: Not compatible
Reviews.Author: Thea Davis
Reviews.Content: Said it was compatible with Nikon D3100...Auto Focus is not. Therefore it is not what it said to be. Horrible

Reviews.Title: You get what you paid
Reviews.Author: M. Alberto Vazquez Rayas "bossmex"
Reviews.Content: These are my first Telephoto lens, I don't like  optical quality of pictures are not sharp, with some cromatical aberration and it's noisy. Good autofocus. I think is better to save more money and get another like 70-300 VR.I like  to take pictures of birds and animals, but the pictures are not sharp, maybe to other needs but not mine.It could be that mine are defective.Second Revision:Now I'm using a Monopod I get Better results, My pictures still look a litle blurry at 300mm, I'm taking pictures at 270mm  with very nice results .

Reviews.Title: amazing lens
Reviews.Author: Albert I. Reiner
Reviews.Content: at almost 1/2 mile from my house I shot a ski trail and the mogules are visible.

Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: Denise Cleveland
Reviews.Content: I didn't realize the difference - it doesn't have the auto zoom capability - wish I had known that. too late to return now

Reviews.Title: wasted my money
Reviews.Author: santana
Reviews.Content: the lens itself is probably ok , but personally i wouldnt have listed it for sale if I were the guy I bought it from , it was dirty beaten up and badly packaged and does not take very good pictures Im sad it was a waste of 140 .00

Reviews.Title: Muy bueno!
Reviews.Author: Trinidad Serrano Jullian
Reviews.Content: Les recomiendo absolutamente este producto. A pesar de no ser autofoco, vale la pena ya que su precio es la mitad y enfocar es realmente fácil, requiere un poco de práctica y listo. El despacho funcionó muy bien y el servicio exlcente.

Reviews.Title: Beware
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: Beware  - this seller does not accept returns - you can get this lens cheaper from other sellers anyway.

Reviews.Title: Good lens but not work well on Nikon D60
Reviews.Author: Lucygirl "Jerry Darter"
Reviews.Content: On the Nikon D60, this lens has no AF if that is what you are looking for.  I returned mine for the Nikon 55-200mm which also has the VR, and I'm looking forward to using as soon as it arrives.

Reviews.Title: Nikon 70-300mm f/4-5.6G AF Nikkor SLR Camera Lens DOES NOT WORK on D5000
Reviews.Author: Geodepe
Reviews.Content: I bought it because it was less expensive than others.Unfortunately, the auto focus does not work on D5000 whichis highly annoying since the advertised product name includes AFin it.Also the image shown is not what was shipped.It has an extra 2 inch rotating black sleeve on the end of it.

Reviews.Title: Not an AF lense
Reviews.Author: Christine
Reviews.Content: The price is good for the lense, but it is NOT an AF lense like the seller says it is. I've got a Nikon D3100 and I was EXTREMELY upset when I realized that it was not Auto Focus. I was looking forward to using it for the 4th of July but that obviously didn't happen. I understand the AF may work with other Nikon cameras, but the seller needs to advertise that the AF will only work with certain cameras. Extremely upset that I wasted my money. I would not recommend this product to customers.

Reviews.Title: THIS is NOT a AF lens
Reviews.Author: Crys
Reviews.Content: I ordered this lens as any normal customer would. Read the fine print and thought man this is a GREAT deal. I received the lens prior to the estimated date. But when I went to use it, it was MANUAL focus, not AUTO focus as the seller is telling everyone. DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Not fully functional with Digital SLR cameras
Reviews.Author: R. Daniels
Reviews.Content: This lens is described in the product description as an auto-focus that will work on digital SLR cameras.  While the lens is technically an "auto-focus lens" it is misleading.  If you have a digital SLR camera youR lens has a switch on the side that allows the camera to focus the lens when you press the photo button.  This lens does not do that.  On a digital SLR camera it is just a manual focus lens.  I called the seller and they wanted to argue that the lens was auto-focus but did agree to allow me to return the lens.  So while the lens was new and the size specified, my complaint is that the description misleads you into thinking that this is a fully autofocus lens compatible and fully functional on digital SLR cameras such as my Nikon D40 it is not.

Reviews.Title: Great Product, Poor service from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Sheraz Hanif
Reviews.Content: The only reason I am giving this 1 start is becuase of Amazon's poor service, otherwise I would give 5 stars for the product.  I placed this order more than 30 days ago.  Amazon still has not shipped the item so I cancelled my order and placed it with J&R.;  If Amazon did not have the item in stock, they should have stated on their web site or at least communicated with me that there will be a delay in Shipping.
